description: This file implements functions for comparing, cloning, and cleaning SLAP variables within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) framework, specifically for the Slap Var Helper Object. It defines key functions: SlapVhoEqualVariables, SlapVhoCloneVariable, and SlapVhoCleanVariable, which manage SLAP_VARIABLE data structures.

methods.name: BOOL SlapVhoEqualVariables(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE slap_variable1,ANSC_HANDLE slap_variable2)
methods.description: Compares two SLAP_VARIABLE instances for equality based on their syntax and content.

methods.name: void SlapVhoCloneVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE src_variable,ANSC_HANDLE dst_variable)
methods.description: Creates a deep copy of a source SLAP_VARIABLE into a destination SLAP_VARIABLE.

methods.name: void SlapVhoCleanVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE slap_variable)
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for a SLAP_VARIABLE's members and resets its state.
